issue.title: Better error reporting on running out of memory with GMTK vs other problems

content.raw: Thanks Richard! Eric can you make a new stack on Trello for Release 1.4.0 and implementing this is the feature. We should have a new minor release because of the change in required GMTK version. The current Release 1.4.0 stuff can be pushed back to 1.5.0.
content.html: Thanks Richard! Eric can you make a new stack on Trello for Release 1.4.0 and implementing this is the feature. We should have a new minor release because of the change in required GMTK version. The current Release 1.4.0 stuff can be pushed back to 1.5.0.
